title: Can I use copyrighted music in my video? - Quora

response.answer_text: No, you can’t use copyrighted music in any video you make unless it’s only for your own personal use and viewing. And this is right and correct. If you worked had and made something, you wouldn’t be happy is somebody just started using it without permission, right?
Well if you're monetizing your video legally, no,,, depends on the song, depends on if your video will make money, depends on if they will find it. Use these factors and find out yourself
